# Crafting Confectionery Solutions Since 1855

For over 160 years, Savage Bros. has continuously manufactured confectionery
machinery. Our candy making and chocolate making equipment are recognized
worldwide for long lived quality and reliability.

Candy Making Equipment

## Your Source for Candy and Confectionary Processing Machinery

As an innovator in candy making, baking and chocolate processing equipment,
Savage Bros has been at the forefront of the industry since 1855. By meeting
the evolving needs of our customers, we remain the top manufacturer and
distributor of high-quality, affordable confectionary and candy making
products.

## Product Categories

## Artisan Retail Confectioner

  * Cooking & Processing
  * Cooling & Cutting
  * Chocolate Processing & Depositing

## Wholesale Confectioner

  * Cooking & Processing
  * Cooling & Cutting
  * Chocolate Processing & Depositing

## Lifting & Pouring

  * Containers to 450 LBS / 200 KG

## Icing & Fondant Tanks

  * Melting & Warming Bakery Icings & Fondants
  * Metering & Transfering 

## About Savage Bros.

From these 19th century roots in the candy industry, Savage equipment has
applications today for the bakery, food processing, cosmetic, pharmaceutical
and material handling industries. Savage Bros. strives to meet its customers’
equipment needs with well designed and manufactured machinery.

About Us Parts & Services

## Reviews

This site is a very useful run-down of Savage equipment and its uses. As the
owner of several stores -Southern Candymakers of New Orleans- it will provide
guidance for buying new equipment for our expansion and for salvaging a number
of older items acquired at auction.

Robert Tompkins

See All Reviews

## Featured and Popular Products

We manufacture and distribute numerous machines to simplify all phases of the
candy making and confectionary creating process. Check out our newest and most
popular equipment innovations.

FireMixer-14 Table-Top Automatic Electric Cooker Mixer with PLC Touch-Screen
Control

This unique ALL ELECTRIC Cooker Mixer produces fudge, caramel, toffee,
brittle, gummies, hard candy - virtually ANY confection. Simple to operate
with PLC Touch-Screen control. One-person processing from start to finish.
Optimum batch size is 20 Lb/10 Kg, depending on recipe. Ideal for Artisan
Confectioners and R&D Labs.

See Product Details

300 Lb to 2,000 Lb Chocolate Melters & temperers

Our large batch tank line offers chocolate melters, conditioners and temperers
in batch sizes of 300, 450, 750, 1250 and 2000 Lb capacities. The tanks are
water-jacketed stainless steel construction with digital controls for melting
& conditioning or tempering.

See Product Details

Magazine Chocolate Bar and Block Melters

Savage adds whole bar & block magazines to their melters to increase melting
through-put. Configurations for chocolate, fondant, butter - any bar or block
that needs melting

See Product Details

## Request Product Information

Discuss your production floor setup and processing needs with our experts, and
we'll pair you with the ideal equipment.

Request Info

Call - (800) 342-0973

## Savage Bros and Toyota

Why would a 165 year old confectionery machine manufacturer turn to Toyota for
help with their production process?

Savage Brothers has been working with the Toyota Production System Support
Center (TSSC) on a project to reduce lead times for one of our most popular
machines, the Firemixer-14 Table Top Cooker. Through the use of Toyota
Production System (TPS) tools, the Firemixer-14 is now ready to ship within
days (if not the same day) of receiving an order compared to its previous 8+
week lead time. To learn more about the Firemixer-14 and the specific tools we
used to achieve such a dramatic improvement in lead time, enjoy Toyota’s
recently released video on the project. Savage plans to continue to use these
tools on other product lines to meet the needs of our customers quicker than
ever before.

##### Savage Brothers: TSSC Project

×

## Savage Bros & the Candymaking Industry

Savage Bros is highly invested in the industry and the people who make sweet
products. We continue to embrace new techniques and foster solutions that make
future innovations possible.

Upcoming Courses

Learn at lectures, roundtables and fully hands-on candy processing courses
with interesting new techniques.

Learn and Create

Exhibitions & Shows

solutions for your next sweet endeavor.

Join Us

New Candymaker Support

Learn at lectures, roundtables and fully hands-on candy processing courses
with interesting new techniques.

Discover More

Industries Served

More than making candy and confections, our products serve many needs in a
vast array of industries.

Where Else

Why Savage Bros

## At the Forefront of the Candymaking Industry

## Innovation

At the forefront of the industry and accelerating innovation for over 150
years - and counting.

## Distribution

The leading manufacturer and national distributor candymaking and
confectionary equipment.

## Service

Supporting our customers with routine maintenance and equipment service
